summary: REQ-81 appears to be implemented in that `referral_review_status` is described as being displayed first at the top of the referral detail/review UI. However, the diff also introduces new UI and logic around a "Referral Review Status" dropdown (including new types and helper functions), which goes beyond the request/constraints (reorder only; no new fields/logic). Additionally, meta/documentation files were updated that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new "Referral Review Status" UI control with dropdown options (Not Reviewed/Reviewed/Accepted/Declined) rather than only reordering an existing `referral_review_status` field/section.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires only reordering the existing field/section and explicitly forbids adding new fields. The diff summary describes adding a dropdown selector UI ("UI ready, pending backend integration").

hallucinated_features.description: Added new frontend logic/types/helpers for referral review status (e.g., `ReferralReviewStatus` union type, `getReviewStatusLabel`, `getReviewStatusVariant`).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest forbids adding or modifying logic/behavior; these helpers and the new type are additional logic not required for a pure UI reorder.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository meta/documentation/state summaries unrelated to the UI reorder (e.g., `frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-81; these changes do not appear necessary to reorder a UI field.
